short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts all assets from a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extractify Lite (Ex-Media Extractor)

Version: 2.1

Description:

Extractify Lite is a robust Chrome extension built for efficiently extracting a variety of content directly from websites. From images, videos, and audio files to reviews, summaries, and emails, Extractify Lite equips you with the tools to gather, preview, and download the content you need—ideal for researchers, marketers, designers, and anyone looking to collect web assets easily.

Key Features:

- Media Extraction: Extract images, videos, audios, PDFs, and raw text seamlessly from any website with enhanced preview options.
- Reviews Extraction: Effortlessly extract reviews from platforms like Google Play and the Apple App Store for comprehensive sentiment analysis and insights.
- Summary and Keywords Extraction: Use AI to generate summaries, extract keywords, and capture relevant site information for research and analysis.
- Fast, Secure, and User-Friendly: Built with simplicity and security in mind, Extractify Lite ensures quick and safe access to content from any web page, with a clean, intuitive interface.

Premium Features:

- URL List Manager: Easily manage URLs by creating a list within the extension, adding current pages, and sending them to the web app for batch processing.
- History of Extractions: View past extractions for easy access and download without revisiting sites.
- Custom AI Assistant: Utilize a personalized AI assistant for deeper insights into extracted content, allowing you to summarize, analyze, and organize findings effortlessly.

How to Use:

1. Install Extractify Lite: Add the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Open the Extension: Click the icon in Chrome’s toolbar to configure extraction settings.
3. Select and Extract: Choose your media types, then click “Extract & Download” or “Extract & Preview” to collect files. In preview mode, view extracted assets before download.
4. Use the Web App: Unlock the full feature set by linking with the Extractify web app, enabling advanced batch processing, extractions history, and a dedicated AI assistant.

-- OFFER: --

Start with a free trial of premium features on the web app! Request a demo by contacting support@extractify.site.

Recent Updates:

- Version2.1: Added enhanced tracking.
- Version 2.0: Added review extraction, enhanced AI-assisted summaries and keyword extraction, URL List Manager, and extended extraction history tracking.
- Version 1.2: Introduced email and text extraction (premium), and integrated web app functionality.
- Version 1.1: Improved folder naming in Downloads and subdomain media extraction.

Permissions Required:

- ActiveTab: Enables access to the current tab for media extraction.
- Downloads: Allows media files to be saved to your computer.
- Storage: Stores extracted media URLs temporarily for preview and history.

Privacy Policy:

Extractify Lite values privacy and does not collect or store personal data. All processing occurs locally on the current web page, ensuring security and user confidentiality.

Support:

For questions, support, or feedback, contact us at support@extractify.site. We’re here to help and always welcome your suggestions for future updates!
